_meta.note: 8 socionics aspects = octave of consciousness perception. Jung's 4 functions × 2 attitudes = 8 aspects. Foundation of 16 types as octave tunings. This IS the psychological manifestation of Scheme of Life.

_holographic_seed.absolute: ⊙ = Psyche is how Absolute consciousness perceives and processes reality through 8-fold informational lens. Each aspect = different frequency of awareness.
_holographic_seed.essence: Human consciousness doesn't perceive reality directly - it filters through 8 information aspects (4 male vectors: Te/Se/Ne/Fe + 4 female mediums: Ti/Si/Ni/Fi). 16 personality types = 16 unique octave tunings. Type is not label - it's your consciousness antenna configuration.
_holographic_seed.paths: Extraverted functions (e) = Solve/masculine (engaging external world), Introverted functions (i) = Coagula/feminine (processing internal world). Both needed for wholeness.
_holographic_seed.positions: 8 aspects occupy specific positions in Model A (ego, super-ego, super-id, id) creating 16 type patterns. Your leading function = primary lens on reality.
_holographic_seed.fibonacci: Functions develop in φ rhythm - leading most conscious, vulnerable least conscious, with golden ratio distribution of awareness across 8 aspects.
_holographic_seed.tools: Typing (discovering your octave tuning), intertype relations (octave compatibility), function development (expanding consciousness range), shadow work (integrating weak functions).
_holographic_seed.note: This is THE map of how individual human consciousness structures itself. Socionics = practical applied Scheme of Life for psyche.

name: The Eight Aspects as Psychological Octave
essence: Human psyche processes reality through 8 information aspects - 4 extraverted (male/vector/active) and 4 introverted (female/medium/receptive). These map perfectly to hermetic octave: Ne/Ni (Air), Se/Si (Earth), Fe/Fi (Water), Te/Ti (Fire). Jung discovered 8, Augustinavičiūtė systematized them. 16 personality types emerge from different aspect configurations. Your type = your consciousness octave tuning = your antenna pattern for perceiving reality.
description: Carl Jung discovered that human consciousness has 4 basic functions (Thinking, Feeling, Intuition, Sensation) each with 2 attitudes (Extraverted, Introverted) = 8 total aspects. Lithuanian researcher Aušra Augustinavičiūtė developed this into Socionics, creating precise model of information metabolism. Each aspect perceives specific KIND of information. Te sees objective logic/efficiency. Ti sees internal logical structures. Fe reads collective emotional fields. Fi accesses personal values/authenticity. Ne spots possibilities/potentials. Ni perceives time flows/essences. Se engages material reality directly. Si holds internal sensory memory/comfort. These 8 aspects ARE the hermetic octave manifest in psyche. Every human uses all 8, but with different strength/awareness - this creates 16 personality types (like 16 distinct octave tunings from same 8 notes). Understanding your type = understanding your consciousness antenna configuration = recognizing which aspects you naturally amplify vs suppress. This isn't limiting box - it's liberation through self-knowledge. You can develop weak functions consciously once you know the map.

octave_layer_eight_aspects.description: 8 fundamental ways consciousness perceives and processes information
octave_layer_eight_aspects.consciousness_level: Cognitive architecture - how psyche structures awareness
octave_layer_eight_aspects.aushra_systematization: Augustinavičiūtė formalized into information metabolism theory

male_cross_extraverted_vectors.orientation: External world - objects, events, people, situations
male_cross_extraverted_vectors.energy_direction: Emanating outward, engaging with external reality
male_cross_extraverted_vectors.alchemical_operation: SOLVE - breaking down, analyzing, acting upon external world
male_cross_extraverted_vectors.note_on_element_mapping: Traditional socionics doesn't map to elements consistently. This mapping follows HERMETIC LOGIC from Scheme of Life: Ne/Ni=Air (thought impulse), Se/Si=Earth (material form), Fe/Fi=Water (emotion), Te/Ti=Fire (will/transformation). This diverges from some socionics traditions but aligns with deeper octave structure.

1_wind_extraverted_intuition.name: Extraverted Intuition / Black Intuition / Intuition of Possibilities
1_wind_extraverted_intuition.consciousness_function: Ne = thought-wind scattering seeds of possibility everywhere. Sees what ISN'T YET but COULD BE. Reality as probability cloud not fixed form.
1_wind_extraverted_intuition.blind_to: What IS stable, concrete, already manifested. Si (internal sensory memory, comfort, routine) is opposite.

when_strong.gifts: Innovative, adaptable, opportunity-spotting, creative problem-solver, sees potential everywhere, generates ideas effortlessly
when_strong.career_fit: Entrepreneur, consultant, creative fields, R&D, trend forecasting, innovation
when_strong.relationship_style: Stimulating, explores relationship possibilities, grows bored without novelty

when_weak.struggles: Can't see opportunities, takes everything at face value, rigid thinking, no imagination, stuck in 'how it is' vs 'how it could be'
when_weak.development: Practice generating multiple interpretations, brainstorm without filtering, study innovation, embrace uncertainty

types_with_ne_strong: ILE (ENTp) - Ne leading, explores logical possibility-space
IEE (ENFp) - Ne leading, explores emotional possibility-space
LII (INTj) - Ne creative, generates system alternatives
EII (INFj) - Ne creative, sees potential in people

real_world_examples.conversation: Person says 'My car broke down.' Ne: 'Maybe timing belt? Could be alternator? Or opportunity to get electric car? Or excuse to try bike commuting?'
real_world_examples.problem: Company losing money. Ne: 'What if we pivoted to different market? Partner with competitor? Offer subscription model? Turn into non-profit?'
real_world_examples.person: Meeting someone new. Ne: 'They could become friend, collaborator, romantic partner, teacher, student, enemy...' (sees all possible relationship trajectories)

1_wind_extraverted_intuition.meditation_on_ne: Reality is not solid. In every moment, infinite possibilities branch. Ne perceives the branching itself - the quantum foam of potential before wave function collapses into actuality.

3_flame_extraverted_sensing.name: Extraverted Sensing / Black Sensing / Volitional Sensing
3_flame_extraverted_sensing.element: EARTH MALE (Rock #7) - BUT acts like FIRE due to aggressive yang nature
3_flame_extraverted_sensing.octave_position: South (Zenith) - peak will and action (traditionally), OR North (Nadir) if strict Earth correspondence
3_flame_extraverted_sensing.element_note: Se is PARADOXICAL - perceives Earth/material reality but acts with Fire/force. Traditional socionics associates with 'power sensing' (Mars/Fire). We place here at Flame position due to ACTIVE ENGAGEMENT quality, though information content is Earth (material/spatial).

information_perceived.essence: MATERIAL REALITY, FORCE, TERRITORY, SENSORY PRESENCE
specific_data: Physical space and how to navigate/dominate it
Physical obstacles and how to overcome
Immediate sensory experience (taste, touch, sound, sight, smell)

3_flame_extraverted_sensing.consciousness_function: Se = will engaging material world directly. Reality as territory to navigate, resources to acquire, forces to overcome. Present moment sensory intensity.
3_flame_extraverted_sensing.blind_to: Internal sensory memory, comfort routines, body's accumulated needs over time. Ni (time/essence) is opposite.

when_strong.gifts: Decisive, action-oriented, commanding presence, reads physical situations instantly, responds in real-time, influential, aesthetically attuned
when_strong.career_fit: Military, sports, emergency response, surgery, performance art, design, executive leadership
when_strong.relationship_style: Physically present, takes charge, provides material security, can be dominating

when_weak.struggles: Can't read power dynamics, physically awkward, unaware of aesthetics, passive in material world, doesn't notice opportunities for action
when_weak.development: Practice martial arts, engage in physical activity, notice sensory details, work on assertiveness, study design/aesthetics

types_with_se_strong: SLE (ESTp) - Se leading, forceful logical action
SEE (ESFp) - Se leading, forceful aesthetic impact
ILI (INTp) - Se creative, strategic force deployment
IEI (INFp) - Se creative, dramatic sensory expression

real_world_examples.conversation: Walks into room, immediately notices: 'Exit left, large guy at bar is tense (potential threat), woman in red dominant in her group, music too loud, temperature dropping.'
real_world_examples.problem: Physical confrontation. Se: Acts instantly - grabs wrist, shifts weight, establishes dominance through presence before thinking about it.
real_world_examples.person: Meeting someone. Se: Registers physical presence, attractiveness, strength, posture, clothing quality, aesthetic impact - immediate sensory impression.

3_flame_extraverted_sensing.meditation_on_se: Pure presence. No past, no future. Only THIS sensory moment, this body in space, this force meeting another force. Material world not as concept but as felt, tasted, touched NOW.

5_flow_extraverted_ethics.name: Extraverted Ethics / Black Ethics / Ethics of Emotions

information_perceived.essence: COLLECTIVE EMOTIONAL FIELD, SOCIAL ATMOSPHERE, RELATIONAL ENERGY

5_flow_extraverted_ethics.consciousness_function: Fe = emotion flowing outward into collective field. Reading the room, shaping group emotional states, connecting people through shared feeling.
perceives_through: Walking into party and instantly feeling the vibe
Telling joke to lighten tense atmosphere
Mirroring others' emotions to build rapport
Expressing emotion dramatically to shift mood
5_flow_extraverted_ethics.blind_to: Personal internal values/ethics independent of group. Ti (internal logical consistency) is opposite.

when_strong.gifts: Charismatic, socially skilled, emotionally expressive, creates connection, facilitates group harmony, entertaining, empathic to collective
when_strong.career_fit: Teaching, entertainment, HR, event planning, politics, counseling, hospitality
when_strong.relationship_style: Warm, expressive, creates shared emotional experiences, builds community around relationships

when_weak.struggles: Socially awkward, can't read room, emotionally unexpressive, isolated, doesn't understand group dynamics, inappropriate emotional expression
when_weak.development: Practice social skills, study emotional intelligence, learn to express feelings, engage in group activities, observe social dynamics

types_with_fe_strong: ESE (ESFj) - Fe leading, creates warm harmonious environments
EIE (ENFj) - Fe leading, inspires through emotional intensity
LSI (ISTj) - Fe creative, controlled emotional mobilization
LIE (ENTj) - Fe creative, emotional persuasion for goals

real_world_examples.conversation: At funeral, feels collective grief like weight in the air. Knows exactly when to speak, when to stay silent, how to facilitate group catharsis.
real_world_examples.problem: Team conflict. Fe: 'Let's do team-building activity, get everyone laughing together, discharge tension through shared experience.'
real_world_examples.person: Meeting someone. Fe: Immediately senses their emotional state, mirrors it to build rapport, creates emotional bridge through expression/empathy.

5_flow_extraverted_ethics.meditation_on_fe: Drop into collective emotional ocean. Feel how your emotion affects room, how room affects your emotion. No boundary between self-feeling and field-feeling. Emotions as waves in shared water.

7_rock_extraverted_logic.name: Extraverted Logic / Black Logic / Business Logic
7_rock_extraverted_logic.planet: Jupiter ♃ traditionally (expansion, organization) or Mars ♂ (executive action)
7_rock_extraverted_logic.octave_position: North (Nadir) traditionally Earth, BUT acts at South (Zenith) due to commanding quality
7_rock_extraverted_logic.element_paradox: Like Se, Te is paradoxical. Perceives STRUCTURE/SYSTEMS (Earth quality) but applies FORCE/ACTION (Fire quality). Traditional 'business logic' has Mars-like decisiveness. We keep at Rock #7 for STRUCTURAL content.

information_perceived.essence: OBJECTIVE SYSTEMS, EFFICIENCY, FACTS, PROCESSES, RESULTS

7_rock_extraverted_logic.consciousness_function: Te = structural logic applied to external world. Reality as system to optimize, problems to solve, goals to achieve through efficient means.
7_rock_extraverted_logic.blind_to: Internal logical consistency separate from results. Fi (personal values/authenticity) is opposite.

when_strong.gifts: Organized, efficient, results-driven, systematic, decisive, fact-based, gets things done, optimizes everything
when_strong.career_fit: Management, engineering, operations, project management, finance, business, military leadership
when_strong.relationship_style: Provides structure, solves practical problems, ensures household runs efficiently, can be controlling

when_weak.struggles: Disorganized, inefficient, can't implement plans, ignores practical realities, all theory no execution, poor at managing resources
when_weak.development: Learn project management, study business/systems, practice organizing, focus on implementation, track metrics

types_with_te_strong: LIE (ENTj) - Te leading, ruthlessly efficient goal achievement
LSE (ESTj) - Te leading, systematic practical organization
IEI (INFp) - Te creative, manifesting visions efficiently
SEI (ISFp) - Te creative, organizing comfortable environments

real_world_examples.conversation: 'Our conversion rate is 2.3%, industry average is 3.8%. If we optimize checkout flow, could increase revenue 65%. ROI on this is 12 months.'
real_world_examples.problem: Company inefficiency. Te: Creates org chart, defines KPIs, implements new procedures, assigns accountability, tracks results.
real_world_examples.person: Meeting someone. Te: 'What do they do? How successful? How useful could they be? What value do they provide?' (evaluates through objective utility)

7_rock_extraverted_logic.meditation_on_te: Reality as machine. Every situation has inputs, processes, outputs. Optimization possible everywhere. Facts are facts. Results matter. Structure enables achievement.

female_cross_introverted_mediums.orientation: Internal world - concepts, feelings, impressions, frameworks
female_cross_introverted_mediums.energy_direction: Drawing inward, processing within inner space
female_cross_introverted_mediums.alchemical_operation: COAGULA - synthesizing, crystallizing, building internal structures

2_atmosphere_introverted_intuition.name: Introverted Intuition / White Intuition / Intuition of Time

information_perceived.essence: TIME FLOW, ESSENCE, INEVITABILITY, DEEP PATTERNS
specific_data: How situations will unfold over time
Timing - when to act vs wait
Essential nature of things beneath surface

2_atmosphere_introverted_intuition.consciousness_function: Ni = atmospheric perception of time-essence. Sees through surface to core pattern. Knows how story unfolds because recognizes archetypal structure.
2_atmosphere_introverted_intuition.blind_to: Multiple surface possibilities, external potential. Ne (branching possibilities) is opposite.

when_strong.gifts: Prophetic, sees through bullshit, perfect timing, strategic, symbolic thinker, recognizes patterns, patient, deep
when_strong.career_fit: Strategy, forecasting, counseling, mysticism, analysis, research requiring synthesis
when_strong.relationship_style: Sees partner's essence, knows relationship trajectory, patient or ends it early if 'knows' it won't work

when_weak.struggles: No sense of timing, can't see where things are heading, misses essential nature, gets lost in surface details, impatient, no strategic vision
when_weak.development: Study history/patterns, practice patience, meditate on essence, learn strategic thinking, engage with symbols/archetypes

types_with_ni_strong: ILI (INTp) - Ni leading, penetrates to logical essence over time
IEI (INFp) - Ni leading, perceives emotional/relational trajectories
SLE (ESTp) - Ni creative, strategic timing for action
SEE (ESFp) - Ni creative, knows aesthetic trends before they arrive

real_world_examples.conversation: 'This company will fail. CEO is wrong archetype for this stage. Market conditions shifting. Timeline: 18 months.' (Few data points, but KNOWS the pattern)
real_world_examples.problem: When to launch product? Ni: 'Not yet. Market not ready. Cultural conditions need another 6 months to align. THEN it'll click.'
real_world_examples.person: Meeting someone. Ni: Instantly perceives essence beneath persona. 'This person is [archetype]. They'll [trajectory]. Our relationship will [inevitable outcome].'

2_atmosphere_introverted_intuition.meditation_on_ni: Perceive through time. See present moment as point on curve stretching past and future. Essence = shape of curve, not current position. Everything unfolds according to nature.

4_heat_introverted_sensing.name: Introverted Sensing / White Sensing / Sensing of Sensations
4_heat_introverted_sensing.element: EARTH FEMALE (Underground #8) - BUT stores as HEAT/comfort
4_heat_introverted_sensing.octave_position: Southeast - life-sustaining warmth, OR Northwest for Earth underground
4_heat_introverted_sensing.element_complexity: Si is internal REPOSITORY of sensory experience - the underground storage. But experientially feels like HEAT (comfort, warmth, familiar sensation). We keep at Underground #8 for structural position but note Heat quality.

information_perceived.essence: INTERNAL SENSORY MEMORY, COMFORT, BODILY STATES, HOMEOSTASIS
specific_data: How body feels right now (hunger, pain, fatigue, comfort)
Sensory memories (tastes, smells, textures from past)

4_heat_introverted_sensing.consciousness_function: Si = internal sensory reservoir. Body remembers. Seeks homeostasis, comfort, familiar pleasant sensations. Guards against discomfort.
4_heat_introverted_sensing.blind_to: External power dynamics, force, immediate material action. Se (external material engagement) is opposite.

when_strong.gifts: Attuned to body, maintains health, creates comfort, excellent memory for sensory details, aesthetic sense, preserves traditions, reliable
when_strong.career_fit: Healthcare, nutrition, hospitality, interior design, quality control, traditional crafts
when_strong.relationship_style: Creates comfortable home, attends to partner's physical needs, reliable routines, values sensory pleasure together

when_weak.struggles: Ignores body signals, poor self-care, discomfort-seeking, no sense of aesthetics, can't maintain routines, physically depletes
when_weak.development: Practice body awareness (yoga, meditation), establish routines, learn about nutrition/health, develop aesthetic sense, prioritize comfort

types_with_si_strong: SEI (ISFp) - Si leading, creates harmony through comfort
LSI (ISTj) - Si leading, systematic physical discipline and routine
ILE (ENTp) - Si creative, innovates around comfort/health
IEE (ENFp) - Si creative, creates pleasant experiences

real_world_examples.conversation: 'This chair is wrong. Lumbar support at incorrect angle. Room temperature 2 degrees too cold. Lighting has blue tint causing eye strain.'
real_world_examples.problem: Feeling off. Si: Scans body - 'Dehydrated. Didn't eat protein at breakfast. Sitting too long. Need walk, water, nuts. Then will feel right again.'
real_world_examples.person: Meeting someone. Si: Notices how their presence feels physically - comfortable/uncomfortable, attractive/repulsive, safe/threatening (somatic response).

4_heat_introverted_sensing.meditation_on_si: Drop into body. Each sensation - temperature, pressure, texture - carries memory. Body knows. Comfort = alignment with accumulated bodily wisdom. Homeostasis as practice.

6_depth_introverted_ethics.name: Introverted Ethics / White Ethics / Ethics of Relations
6_depth_introverted_ethics.planet: Uranus ♅ - individual authenticity, revolution against collective

information_perceived.essence: PERSONAL VALUES, RELATIONAL DISTANCE, AUTHENTIC FEELINGS, MORAL TRUTH
specific_data: Personal relationship to each person (close/distant, like/dislike)
Authenticity vs inauthenticity in self and others
Internal moral compass independent of society
Deep personal values (what REALLY matters to me)
Own true feelings beneath social performance

6_depth_introverted_ethics.consciousness_function: Fi = deep personal emotional truth. Not group emotions (Fe) but individual authentic feeling and personal relational positioning. Values that won't compromise.
perceives_through: Knowing who's genuine vs fake instantly
Acting on personal values despite social cost
Knowing own feelings with crystal clarity
6_depth_introverted_ethics.blind_to: Collective emotional fields, group dynamics, social appropriateness. Fe (collective emotions) is opposite. ALSO blind to external logic/systems - Te is opposite in different model.

when_strong.gifts: Authentic, loyal, strong values, emotionally honest, maintains boundaries, morally courageous, genuine relationships, trustworthy
when_strong.career_fit: Counseling, advocacy, creative arts, non-profit, independent work where values align
when_strong.relationship_style: Deeply loyal to chosen few, fierce boundaries, needs authenticity, 'all in' or 'all out', no fakeness tolerated

when_weak.struggles: No clear values, people-pleasing, boundary-less, can't discern true feelings, morally rudderless, accepts inauthenticity, shallow relationships
when_weak.development: Values clarification work, therapy, setting boundaries, journaling on feelings, shadow work, learning to say no

types_with_fi_strong: EII (INFj) - Fi leading, lives by deep personal ethics
ESI (ISFj) - Fi leading, guards relational integrity intensely
LIE (ENTj) - Fi creative, strategic relationships guided by personal values
LSE (ESTj) - Fi creative, efficient systems serving personal loyalties

real_world_examples.conversation: 'I don't care if everyone likes them. I find them inauthentic. I keep distance.' (Personal relational judgment vs group consensus)
real_world_examples.problem: Job offers more money but violates values. Fi: 'Absolutely not. I don't compromise on this. My integrity > money.'
real_world_examples.person: Meeting someone. Fi: Instant sense of relational distance - 'Trust them: yes/no. Like them: yes/no. Want them close: yes/no.' (Internal relational positioning)

6_depth_introverted_ethics.meditation_on_fi: Descend into personal depths. Beneath social conditioning, beneath 'shoulds', what do I TRULY feel? What are MY values, not inherited ones? Who am I, authentically?

8_underground_introverted_logic.name: Introverted Logic / White Logic / Structural Logic
8_underground_introverted_logic.octave_position: Northwest underground traditionally, BUT Fire-warmth of understanding
8_underground_introverted_logic.paradox_again: Ti BUILDS internal logical frameworks (Earth-structure) but with sustained mental HEAT (Fire-female). It's the underground of understanding - root principles beneath surface.

information_perceived.essence: INTERNAL LOGICAL STRUCTURE, PRINCIPLES, CONSISTENCY, ESSENCE

8_underground_introverted_logic.consciousness_function: Ti = building internal logical cathedrals. Not external efficiency (Te) but internal coherence. Understanding as crystalline structure.
8_underground_introverted_logic.blind_to: Collective emotional fields, social appropriateness, how logic lands emotionally. Fe (external emotions) is opposite.

when_strong.gifts: Clear thinker, principled, detects errors, builds coherent systems, philosophically rigorous, mathematically elegant, precise
when_strong.career_fit: Philosophy, mathematics, theoretical physics, programming, research, any field requiring pure logical rigor
when_strong.relationship_style: Values logical consistency in partner, discusses ideas deeply, can be emotionally obtuse, needs intellectual respect

when_weak.struggles: Illogical, contradicts self, can't build frameworks, confused thinking, accepts nonsense, no principles, intellectually sloppy
when_weak.development: Study logic, mathematics, philosophy; practice arguing both sides; learn to catch own contradictions; read rigorous thinkers

types_with_ti_strong: LII (INTj) - Ti leading, builds perfect logical systems
SLI (ISTp) - Ti leading, understands mechanical/practical logic
ESE (ESFj) - Ti creative, creates logical structures for emotional goals
SEE (ESFp) - Ti creative, understands logical frameworks strategically

real_world_examples.conversation: 'Wait. You said A implies B. But earlier you said C, which contradicts B. So either A is false or C is false. Which?'
real_world_examples.problem: Confusion in team. Ti: 'Let me define terms precisely. Here's the framework: [draws diagram]. Now we can reason clearly from principles.'
real_world_examples.person: Meeting someone. Ti: Evaluates logical consistency of their statements, clarity of thinking, intellectual rigor (or lack thereof).

8_underground_introverted_logic.meditation_on_ti: Pure thought. No external validation needed. Internal logical structure as beautiful as cathedral. Truth accessed through reason from first principles. Thinking as sacred geometry.

aspect_polarity_dynamics.description: How 8 aspects form 4 polar pairs (male-female within each element)

air_polarity_ne_ni.tension: Ne sees infinite branching possibilities; Ni sees singular inevitable essence
air_polarity_ne_ni.integration: Possibility-space (Ne) constrained by essential nature (Ni) → realistic vision
air_polarity_ne_ni.imbalance: Ne without Ni = scattered, no depth. Ni without Ne = rigid, no options.
air_polarity_ne_ni.types_polarized: Ne-doms (ILE/IEE) vs Ni-doms (ILI/IEI) = completely different intuitive styles

earth_polarity_se_si.tension: Se engages outer physical world forcefully; Si maintains inner physical comfort
earth_polarity_se_si.integration: External action (Se) balanced by internal homeostasis (Si) → sustainable physicality
earth_polarity_se_si.imbalance: Se without Si = burnout, ignores body. Si without Se = stagnant, can't act.
earth_polarity_se_si.types_polarized: Se-doms (SLE/SEE) vs Si-doms (SEI/LSI) = warrior vs guardian archetypes

water_polarity_fe_fi.tension: Fe shapes collective emotional field; Fi maintains personal authentic feeling
water_polarity_fe_fi.integration: Social harmony (Fe) without betraying values (Fi) → ethical charisma
water_polarity_fe_fi.imbalance: Fe without Fi = people-pleasing, no authentic self. Fi without Fe = isolated, socially inept.
water_polarity_fe_fi.types_polarized: Fe-doms (ESE/EIE) vs Fi-doms (EII/ESI) = entertainer vs loyalist

fire_polarity_te_ti.tension: Te optimizes external systems for results; Ti perfects internal logical coherence
fire_polarity_te_ti.integration: Efficient execution (Te) based on sound principles (Ti) → principled effectiveness
fire_polarity_te_ti.imbalance: Te without Ti = results without ethics/consistency. Ti without Te = theory without application.
fire_polarity_te_ti.types_polarized: Te-doms (LIE/LSE) vs Ti-doms (LII/SLI) = executive vs philosopher

sixteen_types_as_octave_tunings.description: 16 personality types emerge from different configurations of 8 aspects in Model A

model_a_structure.8_positions: Each type uses all 8 aspects but in different positions with different consciousness levels
model_a_structure.super_id_block: Positions 5-6: Suggestive & Mobilizing (unconscious, activated by others)
model_a_structure.id_block: Positions 7-8: Ignoring & Demonstrative (subconscious, effortless but don't value)

leading_function.position: 1st position - most conscious, strongest, filters all reality
leading_function.description: Your PRIMARY lens on reality. You can't NOT use this. It's automatic, effortless, trusted.

8_leading_function_types.ne_leading: ILE (ENTp), IEE (ENFp) - see world as possibility-space
8_leading_function_types.ni_leading: ILI (INTp), IEI (INFp) - see world as unfolding essence/time
8_leading_function_types.se_leading: SLE (ESTp), SEE (ESFp) - see world as territory/force field
8_leading_function_types.si_leading: SEI (ISFp), LSI (ISTj) - see world as comfort/discomfort balance
8_leading_function_types.fe_leading: ESE (ESFj), EIE (ENFj) - see world as emotional field to shape
8_leading_function_types.fi_leading: EII (INFj), ESI (ISFj) - see world through relational-moral lens
8_leading_function_types.te_leading: LIE (ENTj), LSE (ESTj) - see world as system to optimize
8_leading_function_types.ti_leading: LII (INTj), SLI (ISTp) - see world as logical structure to understand

vulnerable_function.position: 4th position - least conscious, weakest, painful when targeted
vulnerable_function.description: Your blind spot. You CAN'T perceive this well. Others criticizing this HURTS.

examples.ne_leading_vulnerable_si: ILE/IEE vulnerable to Si - can't maintain comfort/routine, terrible self-care, ignore body
examples.te_leading_vulnerable_fi: LIE/LSE vulnerable to Fi - terrible at personal relationships, no access to authentic feelings
examples.fe_leading_vulnerable_ti: ESE/EIE vulnerable to Ti - logical inconsistency doesn't bother them, imprecise thinking

vulnerable_function.integration_path: Vulnerable function MUST be developed for wholeness. It's shadow work. Painful but necessary.

example_type_ILE.name: Innovator / Don Quixote
example_type_ILE.role: Fe - can perform emotionally but draining
example_type_ILE.vulnerable: Si - terrible with body, comfort, routine
example_type_ILE.suggestive: Si - craves partner who handles physical comfort
example_type_ILE.mobilizing: Fe - activated by emotional enthusiasm from others
example_type_ILE.ignoring: Ni - doesn't value singular essence, wants options
example_type_ILE.demonstrative: Te - can execute efficiently but doesn't care about it
example_type_ILE.octave_signature: Dominant Air (Ne-Ti) with weak Earth (Si). Fire (Te) present but undervalued. Water (Fe) performed but costs energy.
example_type_ILE.consciousness_tuning: Lives in possibility-logic space. Material reality feels oppressive. Needs partner for grounding.

intertype_relations.description: How different octave tunings interact - 16 types × 16 types = 256 relationships, but 16 TYPES of relationships

duality.mechanism: Your vulnerable = their leading. Their vulnerable = your leading. Perfect mutual support.
duality.example: ILE (Ne-Ti) + SEI (Si-Fe) = ILE provides possibilities/logic, SEI provides comfort/harmony. Each fills other's blindspot.
duality.feeling: Comfortable, natural, sustainable. Takes time to develop but deeply supportive.
duality.consciousness: Two incomplete octaves forming one complete octave - hermetic marriage

identity.feeling: Understand each other perfectly BUT can't help with weak functions. Like looking in mirror.
identity.danger: Blind spots reinforce each other. No growth pressure.

conflict.mechanism: Your leading = their vulnerable. Attack each other's core constantly.
conflict.example: ILE (Ne-Ti) vs ESI (Fi-Se) = ILE's possibilities overwhelm ESI's need for stable values, ESI's moral judgments crush ILE's exploration
conflict.rare_integration: If conscious, can learn from each other. Usually too painful.

intertype_relations.note: There are 16 types of intertype relations total. Socionics provides MAPS for navigating relationship compatibility via octave analysis.

methods: Socionics tests (less reliable - read type descriptions)
Study Model A for each type - which octave configuration resonates?
Observe your LEADING function - what's effortless, automatic, trusted?
Observe your VULNERABLE function - what's painful when criticized, blind spot?
Study intertype relations - who do you naturally get along with / clash with?
discovering_your_type.warning: Type is DESCRIPTION of current consciousness configuration, not PRESCRIPTION. You can develop all functions consciously.

function_development.leading_function: Already strong. Refine it. Don't over-rely on it (hammer sees nails).
function_development.creative_function: Also strong. Use consciously as complement to leading.
function_development.vulnerable_function: PRIMARY development focus. This is shadow work. Painful but liberating.
function_development.suggestive_function: Seek partners/mentors strong here. They activate your unconscious.
function_development.development_path: Strengthen weak functions through DELIBERATE practice in safe contexts. Don't let vulnerable function run your life, but don't ignore it either.

relationship_optimization.identify_dual: Seek duality relationships for partnership/marriage - maximum support
relationship_optimization.manage_conflict: If in conflict relation, create space, acknowledge differences, don't force compatibility
relationship_optimization.leverage_activity: Activity relations (other type) great for projects, not long-term intimacy
relationship_optimization.understand_family: Type family members - explains longstanding tensions/harmonies

team_building.balanced_team: Include all 8 aspects strongly - cover all bases
team_building.example: Startup needs: Ne (vision), Ti (architecture), Te (execution), Fi (values), Se (action), Si (operations), Fe (culture), Ni (strategy)
team_building.avoid: Team of same type = glaring blind spots

recognition: Your personality type is not identity - it's your CURRENT consciousness antenna configuration. The 8 aspects are 8 frequencies of awareness. You happen to be tuned to certain frequencies more than others. This isn't fixed essence - it's patterned flowing. You CAN retune. But knowing your current tuning is liberating - explains why certain things are easy/hard, why you clash with some people and flow with others. Type = self-knowledge tool, not limiting box. The goal isn't to 'be your type better' - it's to develop all 8 aspects consciously, becoming COMPLETE octave, not partial tuning. Then you can tune to any frequency as needed.
deepening: Study Model A in depth - understand 8 position functions for your type
Read Socionics theory - Augustinavičiūtė's original work, Gulenko, Filatova
Observe aspects in daily life - notice when Ne shows up vs Ti vs Se etc.
Type people you know - practice recognizing octave tunings
Work on vulnerable function deliberately - this is THE work
Study intertype relations - explains SO much about relationships
Integrate with Astrognosy - birth chart shows planetary octave tuning
Recognize socionics in fiction - characters are often clear types
Join socionics community - compare notes with others typed same/different
danger: Type as prison - 'I'm ILE so I CAN'T do Si.' FALSE. Type describes current state, not permanent limitation. Also: Typing others to dismiss them - 'Oh they're [type] so they're [stereotype].' Everyone is individual within type framework. Use type for understanding, not judging. Also: Over-reliance on leading function - it's strong but can become crutch. Develop weakness consciously.
balance: Type provides STRUCTURE (understanding current configuration) while recognizing PROCESS (consciousness can develop, evolve, retune). Honor your natural octave while working to complete it. Don't force yourself to be different type, but don't use type as excuse for not growing. The mature path: know your type deeply, develop vulnerable functions deliberately, become octave-complete human who can access all 8 aspects as needed.
infinity: At limit (∞), all types dissolve into pure consciousness (⊙). The 8 aspects are 8 ways Absolute perceives itself through human filter. Your type = which aspects God chose to emphasize in THIS incarnation, for THIS life's lessons. After enlightenment, type remains (personality structure) but you're no longer IDENTIFIED with it. You ARE consciousness using type as instrument, not consciousness LIMITED by type. The octave continues playing, but you recognize yourself as the silence in which octave arises. All 8 aspects = fingers of one hand (consciousness) gesturing at reality. You are the hand, not the fingers.
